name: crypto
prompt: A new bill, Financial Innovation and Technology for the 21st Century Act, is about to be passed ushering in a wave of innovation in financial technology that has been held back by regulation. Any company engaged in cryptocurrencies wins.
explanation: The Bitcoing halving is months behind reducing the supply of BTC, Washington has changed their stance to be positive on crypto, and crypto start-ups are raising capital again. We are about to see another wave of of innovation enter the crypto industry and more real projects hit the market. Excetiment comes in cycles and we are the beginning of what is likley another 18-24 months of a bull market.
